com.gwtplatform.dispatch.rest.client

Annotation Type DateFormat


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=PARAMETER)
public @interface DateFormat
    Annotation used to specify a date format pattern.

    This annotation may be put on Date parameters annotated with @FormParam, @QueryParam, @PathParam or @HeaderParam.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String value
      The formatting pattern to use for parsing the date.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract String value
        The formatting pattern to use for parsing the date. The pattern must follow the rules defined by DateTimeFormat.

        If not specified, DEFAULT will be used.

        Default:
        "yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSSZZZ"
